birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省忻州直隶州定襄县蒋村
birth_place.en: Jiangcun, Dingxiang County, Xinzhou Prefecture, Shanxi Province

death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，中共八大元老之一。曾任中央顾问委员会常务副主任、国务院副总理、中央人民政府财政部部长等职务。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party and People's Republic of China political figure, a former national-level deputy leader, and one of the Eight Elders of the CCP. He served as the Executive Deputy Director of the Central Advisory Commission, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of Finance of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国核心领导人，薄一波曾是其主政时期的中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Core leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Bo Yibo was one of the Eight Elders of the CCP during his administration.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记。1978年为薄一波平反，1987年在薄一波等人主持的“党内生活会”后被迫辞职。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. He rehabilitated Bo Yibo in 1978 and was forced to resign in 1987 after a "Party life meeting" presided over by Bo Yibo and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一场政治运动，期间薄一波因“六十一人叛徒集团案”遭受迫害。
description.en: A political movement in China during which Bo Yibo was persecuted due to the "Case of the 61 Renegades".

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间的一起重大冤案，薄一波因此案被诬陷打倒并遭到迫害。
description.en: A major wrongful case during the Cultural Revolution, which led to Bo Yibo being framed, overthrown, and persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人之一，在文化大革命期间举报“六十一人叛徒集团案”，导致薄一波等人遭受迫害。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China. During the Cultural Revolution, he reported the "Case of the 61 Renegades," leading to the persecution of Bo Yibo and others.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年间设立的机构，薄一波曾任常务副主任。
description.en: An institution established by the Communist Party of China between 1982 and 1992, where Bo Yibo served as the Executive Deputy Director.

en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的高级领导职务，薄一波曾两度担任此职。
description.en: A senior leadership position in the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which Bo Yibo held twice.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的财政主管机构，薄一波为首任部长。
description.en: The financial authority in the early days of the People's Republic of China, with Bo Yibo as its first minister.

nodes.id: 山西省立国民师范学校

zh-cn: 山西省立国民师范学校

description.zh-cn: 薄一波早年就读的学校。
description.en: The school Bo Yibo attended in his early years.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党培养高级干部的学校，薄一波曾在此学习。
description.en: A school of the Communist Party of China for training senior cadres, where Bo Yibo once studied.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的第二任妻子，曾任其秘书，在文化大革命期间自杀。
description.en: Bo Yibo's second wife, formerly his secretary, who committed suicide during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波与胡明之子，前中共重庆市委书记、中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Son of Bo Yibo and Hu Ming, former Secretary of the CCP Chongqing Municipal Committee and member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 山西军阀。抗战初期曾与薄一波合作，后发动“晋西事变”试图消灭薄一波领导的山西新军。
description.en: A warlord in Shanxi. He collaborated with Bo Yibo in the early stages of the Anti-Japanese War, but later launched the "Jinxi Incident" in an attempt to eliminate the Shanxi New Army led by Bo.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由薄一波在山西创建和领导的群众抗日团体。
description.en: A mass anti-Japanese organization founded and led by Bo Yibo in Shanxi during the Anti-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由薄一波在山西组建的武装部队，通称“山西新军”。
description.en: An armed force organized by Bo Yibo in Shanxi during the Anti-Japanese War, commonly known as the "Shanxi New Army".

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国主席。1936年，在其建议下，薄一波等人得以出狱。文革期间，与薄一波同因“六十一人叛徒集团案”遭受迫害。
description.en: Former Chairman of the People's Republic of China. In 1936, on his suggestion, Bo Yibo and others were released from prison. During the Cultural Revolution, both he and Bo Yibo were persecuted due to the "Case of the 61 Renegades".

description.zh-cn: 1986年底在中国各地爆发的学生运动。此次学潮被中共元老们视为时任总书记胡耀邦纵容资产阶级自由化的结果，并成为其下台的导火索之一。
description.en: Student movements that erupted across China at the end of 1986. These protests were seen by CCP elders as a result of then-General Secretary Hu Yaobang's tolerance of bourgeois liberalization and became one of the triggers for his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，参与了决定胡耀邦下台的会议。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, who participated in the meeting that decided on Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，参与了决定胡耀邦下台的会议。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, who participated in the meeting that decided on Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，参与了决定胡耀邦下台的会议。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, who participated in the meeting that decided on Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，参与了决定胡耀邦下台的会议。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP, who participated in the meeting that decided on Hu Yaobang's removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，在逼迫胡耀邦下台的“党内生活会”上，是唯一支持胡耀邦并斥责其他元老的人。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CCP. At the "Party life meeting" that forced Hu Yaobang to step down, he was the only one who supported Hu and rebuked the other elders.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的抗议示威活动，薄一波支持采取果断措施（包括戒严）以恢复社会秩序。
description.en: Protests and demonstrations that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, in 1989. Bo Yibo supported taking decisive measures, including martial law, to restore social order.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。薄一波在其任期内担任财政部长和国务院副总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Bo Yibo served as Minister of Finance and Vice Premier during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的父亲。
description.en: Bo Yibo's father.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的母亲。
description.en: Bo Yibo's mother.

relationships.target: 山西省立国民师范学校

description.zh-cn: 1922年，薄一波考入山西省立国民师范学校。
description.en: In 1922, Bo Yibo was admitted to the Shanxi Provincial National Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 1943年12月，薄一波赴延安入中共中央党校学习。
description.en: In December 1943, Bo Yibo went to Yan'an to study at the Central Party School of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波担任中国共产党中央顾问委员会常务副主任，主持日常工作。
description.en: Bo Yibo served as the Executive Deputy Director of the Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China, presiding over its daily work.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波曾两度被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Bo Yibo was twice appointed as Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，薄一波出任首任中央人民政府财政部部长。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Bo Yibo became the first Minister of Finance of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，因“六十一人叛徒集团案”，薄一波被诬陷打倒，并遭到迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Bo Yibo was framed, overthrown, and persecuted due to the "Case of the 61 Renegades".

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的妻子胡明在文化大革命被批斗送押期间服安眠药自杀。
description.en: Bo Yibo's wife, Hu Ming, committed suicide by taking sleeping pills while being detained and subjected to struggle sessions during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 康生在文化大革命期间举报并举出“六十一人叛徒集团案”，导致薄一波遭受迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Kang Sheng reported and brought up the "Case of the 61 Renegades," leading to the persecution of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月，在胡耀邦的主持下，中共中央为薄一波及“六十一人叛徒集团案”彻底平反，恢复名誉。
description.en: In December 1978, under the direction of Hu Yaobang, the CCP Central Committee completely rehabilitated Bo Yibo and the "Case of the 61 Renegades," restoring their reputations.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波主持了为期七天的“党内生活会”，批评胡耀邦的“问题”，最终迫使其辞去总书记职务。
description.en: Bo Yibo presided over a seven-day "Party life meeting" to criticize Hu Yaobang's "problems," ultimately forcing him to resign from the position of General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，薄一波创建了牺牲救国同盟会，并发展其成为中国共产党领导的群众抗日团体。
description.en: During the Anti-Japanese War, Bo Yibo founded the Sacrifice for National Salvation League and developed it into a mass anti-Japanese organization led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在阎锡山的支持下，薄一波组建了山西新军“山西青年抗敌决死队”，并兼任总队政委。
description.en: With the support of Yan Xishan, Bo Yibo formed the Shanxi New Army, the "Shanxi Youth Anti-Enemy Dare-to-Die Corps," and served as its political commissar.

description.zh-cn: 出狱后，薄一波被派往太原，与山西地方军阀阎锡山达成从事抗日救亡工作的协议。
description.en: After being released from prison, Bo Yibo was sent to Taiyuan and reached an agreement with the local Shanxi warlord Yan Xishan to engage in anti-Japanese national salvation work.

description.zh-cn: 1939年底，阎锡山发动晋西事变（十二月事变），意图消灭薄一波领导的山西新军，双方关系破裂。
description.en: At the end of 1939, Yan Xishan launched the Jinxi Incident (December Incident) in an attempt to eliminate the Shanxi New Army led by Bo Yibo, leading to a rupture in their relationship.

description.zh-cn: 1936年，经刘少奇率领的中共中央北方局建议，薄一波等人得以通过在“自白书”上画押的方式出狱。
description.en: In 1936, following a suggestion from the CCP's Northern Bureau led by Liu Shaoqi, Bo Yibo and others were released from prison by signing a "confession letter".

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是薄一波的次子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the second son of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是胡明的儿子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the son of Hu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 在逼迫胡耀邦下台的“党内生活会”上，习仲勋斥责薄一波等元老们动用文革式手段，是违反党的原则的。
description.en: At the "Party life meeting" that forced Hu Yaobang to step down, Xi Zhongxun rebuked elders like Bo Yibo for using Cultural Revolution-style methods, which violated Party principles.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波在周恩来担任总理期间，先后出任财政部长和国务院副总理。
description.en: During Zhou Enlai's premiership, Bo Yibo served successively as Minister of Finance and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，薄一波任晋冀鲁豫中央局副书记和军区副政委，协助邓小平主持日常工作。
description.en: In 1945, Bo Yibo served as Deputy Secretary of the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Central Bureau and Deputy Political Commissar of the military region, assisting Deng Xiaoping in managing daily affairs.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年六四天安门事件前夕，薄一波向邓小平提出要采取果断措施，并支持对北京实施戒严以恢复社会秩序。
description.en: On the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident, Bo Yibo proposed to Deng Xiaoping that decisive measures should be taken and supported the implementation of martial law in Beijing to restore social order.

description.zh-cn: 陈云与其他中共元老商议了胡耀邦的去留问题，并在随后的“党内生活会”上推动其下台。
description.en: Chen Yun discussed the issue of Hu Yaobang's political future with other CCP elders and pushed for his ousting at the subsequent "Party life meeting".

description.zh-cn: 薄一波是薄昌福的儿子。
description.en: Bo Yibo is the son of Bo Changfu.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波是胡秀清的儿子。
description.en: Bo Yibo is the son of Hu Xiuqing.
